explanation: [0-0] In a well-lit store, a tall man in a blue suit jacket and black pants sits on a chair, surrounded by onlookers. A man in a pink suit jacket is measuring him with a tape measure.

[0-7] The tall man stands up, his height significantly exceeding everyone around him. Another man in a pink suit needs to stand on the chair and assist with the tape measure to complete the measurement.
